song_name: Beggin' On Your Knees (feat. Victoria Justice)
lyrics:
6 contributorsbeggin’ on your knees demo lyricsverse 1
you had it all
the day you told me told me you loved me
i had it all
but let you fool me fool me completely

prechorus 1
yeah i was so stupid to give you all my affection
cause that look you gave her exposed your indiscretions

chorus
and one day
ill have you beggin on your knees for me
yeah one day
ill have you crawlin like a centipede
you go with me and go with her
so ill make sure you get what you deserve
yeah one day
youll be beggin on your knees for me

verse 2
so watch your back
cause you dont know when or where i could tell her
we overlapp
when you met her you and i were together
you might also likeprechorus 2
so oh mister player do you feel like the man now
and i bet youre nervous cause this song makes you freak out

chorus
and one day
ill have you beggin on your knees for me
yeah one day
ill have you crawlin like a centipede
you go with me and go with her
so ill make sure you get what you deserve
yeah one day
youll be beggin on your knees for me

bridge
i know im being bitter
but imma drag you under
cause you just dont dont deserve happy ever after
for what you did to me after you told me you never felt that way
it was only just a game

you had it all
and one day

chorus
and one day
ill have you beggin on your knees for me beggin on your knees for me
yeah one day
ill have you crawlin like a centipede
crawlin like a centipede
you go with me  and go with her
so ill make sure you get what you deserve
yeah one day
